title: Infial
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Western, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Middle Eastern
description: Collectively-run anarchist venue in Taksim area, established 2015 summer and reported is operating as of Nov 2015. Houses a free shop, small library, a symbolic stage, small bar and seating area. The bar serves alcoholic drinks on selected days; tea and coffee with soy milk everyday. Hosts film screenings, vegan Sunday brunch, workshops, plenaries and solidarity parties of some local anti-authoritarian groups. Events are announced on its blog. One will not find sufficient food options here everyday but it serves some kind of vegan hot dish at every workshop.
